info.brief_description: Ever have a massage you didn't like? What if you could have it done the way you like it?
info.description:
Some massages are great, others you wish you could get your money back. I had the chance to experiment with a new device that was attached to your head. A thin, rubberband-type object that you place around your forehead like a sweatband. It's padded so it's comfortable to wear. The researchers told me that when this object is hooked up, it could read or type out my thoughts. It was still experimental, but hopefully thru testing, it can become a reality.
In a side room next to the lab, I was instructed to undress and lay down on the padded table face up. I felt the table and noticed it was heated, so I quickly undressed, kicking off my shoes, pulling my pants and shirt off and laying down, face up wearing only my boxers and socks. The masseuse came in and attached the device around my forehead. A monitor off to the corner immediately switched on and said hello. I looked over at it and thought of a greeting to say to her. Immediately, the screen flashed "Good Afternoon, I'm Marty" . She responded to me verbally that her name was Keira. She asked if I was warm enough and looked at the screen for an answer. I responded thru my mind "Yes". I then went onto say that she could take my socks and underwear off if it would help with the massage. She says in reply not to worry...its a natural reaction to massaging various parts of the body. I respond thru my thoughts..."thank you".
When she completes my backside, she has me turn over. She places a small cloth over my erection, but it falls off. Trying to replace it, my thoughts tell her to just leave it off. Beginning with my chest and abs, she rubs and tugs every inch which feels good. As she goes down to my legs and bare feet, my erection seems to get in the way as her hands knead my thighs. She stops and walks to the end of the table and caresses my bare feet and toes, sliding her fingers between my toes. I am breathing heavy and think I am going to climax.
